meta.title: Constela - A compiler-first UI language
meta.description: A compiler-first UI language for vibecoding

class.value: relative overflow-hidden px-6 py-24 sm:py-32 lg:py-40

value.value: A compiler-first UI language for vibecoding

class.value: mx-auto mt-6 max-w-2xl text-lg leading-8 text-muted-foreground

value.value: Define your UI as structured JSON, let the compiler validate your schema, and render with a minimal, reactive runtime. Perfect for AI-assisted development.

class.value: mt-10 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 sm:flex-row
inline-flex h-12 w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg bg-primary px-6 text-base font-medium text-primary-foreground transition-colors hover:bg-primary/90 sm:w-auto
inline-flex h-12 w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg border border-border px-6 text-base font-medium text-foreground transition-colors hover:bg-muted sm:w-auto
border-t border-border bg-muted/30 px-6 py-16 sm:py-24

value.value: Constela delivers faster builds and smaller bundles compared to traditional frameworks.

value.value: Constela bridges the gap between human intent and machine-generated UI with a language designed from the ground up for reliability.

value.value: JSON-based structure that AI models can easily generate, understand, and validate without ambiguity.

class.value: group rounded-xl border border-border bg-background p-6 transition-all hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/5
mb-4 flex h-12 w-12 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary/10 text-primary transition-colors group-hover:bg-primary group-hover:text-primary-foreground

value.value: Every action step is typed and predictable. No hidden side effects, no surprises.

class.value: group rounded-xl border border-border bg-background p-6 transition-all hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/5
mb-4 flex h-12 w-12 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary/10 text-primary transition-colors group-hover:bg-primary group-hover:text-primary-foreground

value.value: Compile-time validation catches errors before runtime. Invalid UI definitions never make it to production.

class.value: group rounded-xl border border-border bg-background p-6 transition-all hover:border-primary/50 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/5
mb-4 flex h-12 w-12 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary/10 text-primary transition-colors group-hover:bg-primary group-hover:text-primary-foreground

value.value: Fine-grained reactivity without a virtual DOM. Only what changes gets updated.

mb-4 flex h-12 w-12 items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary/10 text-primary transition-colors group-hover:bg-primary group-hover:text-primary-foreground

value.value: JSON Pointer paths pinpoint exact error locations. Debug faster with precise, actionable messages.
A simple counter in Constela. Declarative state, typed actions, and reactive views in pure JSON.
